Name: Fallen Leaves
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Suitably autumnal in colour. Two vermouths and two brandies presented in harmony.
History: Created in 1982 by Charles Schumann in Munich, Germany, and first published in his book American Bar .
Nutrition: One serving of Fallen Leaves contains 110 calories
